metadata.name: Web Onboarding DK - Contents With Autocomplete
metadata.title: DENMARK_CONTENTS_APP_METADATA_TITLE

passages.name: addressManual
passages.text:
<Track name="AddressNotFound"
       keys="[addressSearchTerm]"
>
</Track>

<Message>
  {ADDRESS_AUTOCOMPLETE_NOT_FOUND_APOLOGY}
</Message>

<Message>
  {ADDRESS_AUTOCOMPLETE_NOT_FOUND_PROMPT}
</Message>

<Response>
  {street}, {zipCode}
</Response>

<TextActionSet next="[[{DK_CONTENT_CONVERSATION_CONTINUE}->addressManualTrack]]">
  <TextAction title="{DK_CONTENT_CONVERSATION_ADDRESS_TEXT_ACTION_TITLE_ADDRESS}"
              placeholder="{DK_CONTENT_CONVERSATION_ADDRESS_PLACEHOLDER}"
              large="true"
              key="street"
  >
  </TextAction>
  <TextAction title="{DK_CONTENT_CONVERSATION_ADDRESS_TEXT_ACTION_TITLE_ZIP_CODE}"
              mask="NorwegianPostalCode"
              placeholder="{DK_CONTENT_CONVERSATION_ZIP_CODE_PLACEHOLDER}"
              key="zipCode"
  >
  </TextAction>
</TextActionSet>

passages.name: name
passages.text:
<Redirect to="[[errorCoInsured]]"
          when="coInsured > 6"
>
</Redirect>

<Message>
  {DK_CONTENT_CONVERSATION_NAME_MESSAGE_1}
</Message>

<TextActionSet next="[[{DK_CONTENT_CONVERSATION_CONTINUE}->birthDate]]">
  <TextAction title="{DK_CONTENT_NAME_TEXT_ACTION_TITLE_FIRST_NAME}"
              placeholder="{DK_CONTENT_NAME_TEXT_ACTION_PLACEHOLDER_FIRST_NAME}"
              large="true"
              key="firstName"
  >
  </TextAction>
  <TextAction title="{DK_CONTENT_NAME_TEXT_ACTION_TITLE_SURNAME}"
              placeholder="{DK_CONTENT_NAME_TEXT_ACTION_PLACEHOLDER_SURNAME}"
              large="true"
              key="lastName"
  >
  </TextAction>
</TextActionSet>

passages.name: OfferSuccess
passages.text:
<Redirect to="[[offerUwLimit]]"
          when="createQuoteBundleResultTypename == QuoteBundleError"
>
</Redirect>

<QuoteCartOfferRedirect when="true"
                        id="quoteCartId"
                        insurancetypes="DANISH_HOME_CONTENT"
>
</QuoteCartOfferRedirect>

passages.name: studentEligibilityCheck
passages.text:
<Redirect to="[[Offer]]"
          when="birthDate.Age > 30 || livingSpace > 100 || coInsured > 1"
          key="isStudent"
          value="false"
>
</Redirect>

<Redirect to="[[student]]"
          when="true"
>
</Redirect>

passages.name: address
passages.text:
<Track name="AddressNotFound"
       keys="[addressSearchTerm]"
>
</Track>

<Message>
  {ADDRESS_AUTOCOMPLETE_NOT_FOUND_APOLOGY}
</Message>

<Message>
  {ADDRESS_AUTOCOMPLETE_NOT_FOUND_PROMPT}
</Message>

<Response>
  {street}, {zipCode}
</Response>

<TextActionSet next="[[{DK_CONTENT_CONVERSATION_CONTINUE}->addressManualTrack]]">
  <TextAction title="{DK_CONTENT_CONVERSATION_ADDRESS_TEXT_ACTION_TITLE_ADDRESS}"
              placeholder="{DK_CONTENT_CONVERSATION_ADDRESS_PLACEHOLDER}"
              large="true"
              key="street"
  >
  </TextAction>
  <TextAction title="{DK_CONTENT_CONVERSATION_ADDRESS_TEXT_ACTION_TITLE_ZIP_CODE}"
              mask="NorwegianPostalCode"
              placeholder="{DK_CONTENT_CONVERSATION_ZIP_CODE_PLACEHOLDER}"
              key="zipCode"
  >
  </TextAction>
</TextActionSet>

passages.name: Offer
passages.text:
<Message>
  {DK_CONTENT_CONVERSATION_OFFER_MESSAGE_1}
</Message>

<GraphQLApi next="[[OfferSuccess]]">
  <Mutation>
    mutation CreateDanishHomeContentQuoteBundle(
	  $quoteCartId: ID!
	  $input: CreateQuoteBundleInput!
	) {
	  quoteCart_createQuoteBundle(id: $quoteCartId, input: $input) {
	  	__typename
		... on QuoteCart {
		  id
		}
		... on QuoteBundleError {
		  limits {
			code
		  }
		}
	  }
	}
  </Mutation>
  <Variable key="quoteCartId"
            from="quoteCartId"
            as="string"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="input.payload[0].firstName"
            from="firstName"
            as="string"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="input.payload[0].lastName"
            from="lastName"
            as="string"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="input.payload[0].birthDate"
            from="birthDate"
            as="string"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="input.payload[0].email"
            from="email"
            as="string"
  >
  </Variable>
  <ConstantVariable key="input.payload[0].data.type"
                    value="DANISH_HOME_CONTENT"
                    as="string"
  >
  </ConstantVariable>
  <Variable key="input.payload[0].data.numberCoInsured"
            from="coInsured"
            as="int"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="input.payload[0].data.livingSpace"
            from="livingSpace"
            as="int"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="input.payload[0].data.street"
            from="street"
            as="string"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="input.payload[0].data.zipCode"
            from="zipCode"
            as="string"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="input.payload[0].data.subType"
            from="type"
            as="string"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="input.payload[0].data.isStudent"
            from="isStudent"
            as="boolean"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="input.payload[0].data.bbrId"
            from="bbrId"
            as="string"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="input.payload[0].data.city"
            from="city"
            as="string"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="input.payload[0].data.floor"
            from="floor"
            as="string"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Variable key="input.payload[0].data.apartment"
            from="apartment"
            as="string"
  >
  </Variable>
  <Error next="[[offerError]]">
  </Error>
  <Result key="quoteCart_createQuoteBundle.__typename"
          as="createQuoteBundleResultTypename"
  >
  </Result>
</GraphQLApi>
